short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tikist your Tasks To Do List app with local device storage, calendar integration and sharing functionality.

long.ar,bn,de,es,fr,hi,ru:
A "Things To Do List". Simple, Server-less and Free. Create lists of tasks, check as complete, highlight priority, delete, sort, share and calendarize!.

Language coverage includes English, Spanish, German, Mandarin, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Russia, Portuguese, Urdu.

Many to do lists are over engineered and veer towards calendar events and project management. TTDList is designed for fast task additions that can be sent to calendars as events and also shared quickly without sign ons or risking having your data stored on third party servers.

Data is stored in the browser. This means it is private to you. However as this is a cache store, if the browser cache is cleared then this data will be deleted.

Our aim is to keep this as simple as possible with as little distraction on the page.

We look forward to your ideas to improve TTDList.

Happy Tasking!
long.am,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
Tikist - Your Personal “Things To Do” Manager

Simple. Server-free. Secure. Enjoy a streamlined to-do list app that empowers you to organize tasks effortlessly, all while keeping your private data truly private. Fast, clutter-free, and packed with features!

Key Features:

	•	Minimalist Interface - Stay focused with a clean, intuitive design.
	•	Dark and Light Modes - Choose the best look for any time of day.
	•	Task Management - Create, organize, and check off tasks seamlessly.
	•	Prioritize - Highlight urgent tasks to keep your focus sharp.
	•	Calendar Integration - Add start/due dates, send tasks to your calendar.
	•	Folder Organization - Group and sort lists into custom folders.
	•	Quick Sharing - Share lists instantly via a simple link.
	•	Tag and Note Options - Add tags, notes, or URLs to enrich task details.
	•	Event Timelines - Visualize upcoming events with our timeline feature.
	•	Download Your Data - Keep a backup or transfer to another device.
	•	Full Logs View - Track changes and review your to-do history.

With multi-language support including English, Spanish, German, Mandarin, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Russian, Portuguese, and Urdu, Tikist is ready for global users.

Privacy-Centric, EU Compliant, and Serverless

Many task managers save your private data on their servers, often outside of your control. Under EU law, this can raise data sovereignty concerns. Tikist keeps everything on your device—no servers, no cloud, and no risk of unauthorized access. Data is saved locally in your browser’s cache, meaning it’s yours and yours alone. However, as cache-based storage is not permanent, you can download your data anytime through the menu.

Tikist is purpose-built to be light, responsive, and distraction-free, with just the essentials for daily productivity.

Join Us!

We’re constantly evolving and welcome feedback to make Tikist even better. Dive into secure, clutter-free task management today. Happy Tasking!
